sentences.en: His friends used to tease him about his tatty clothes.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友过去常常笑话他破旧的衣服.

sentences.en: There are fewer tatty schools and run - down hospitals.
sentences.cn: 国内很少再有简陋的学校和医院了.

sentences.en: There were a lot of guest houses which were very tatty.
sentences.cn: 有许多小旅馆都又脏又乱。

sentences.en: They seemed unreal and kind of tatty.
sentences.cn: 这些礼拜仪式似乎不是真实的且显得有点寒酸.

sentences.en: Using tatty , worn, dirty, or scratchy wash mitts, sponges, drying towels etc.
sentences.cn: 使用破旧的 、 脏的或者有刮擦声的洗车毛巾 、 海棉 、 干毛巾等.

words.tran_cn: 不整洁的；不值钱的；破旧的

trans.tran_cn: <口>破烂的，衣衫褴褛的，粗糙的，低劣的
